title: leaver buster buster
body: Okay, so I have times when my internet bugs out and it disconnects me from the game, or my laptop overheats because I've been playing league for ~~five hours~~ too long & of course I get reported for being afk even if I manage to get back into the game before the end. Is there any way to contend the leaver buster or do you just have to take the punishment for a terrible laptop/wifi? And does anyone else have this problem?

replies.body: There will be others but the solution is to take a break for 15 minutes every hour and do something else so you don't strain your eyes like the safety manual says.
